speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report by Lasse Lehtinen, on behalf of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on the obligations of cross-border service providers ( 2006/2049(INI) ) ( A6-0294/2007 ).
original: President. − The next item is the report by Lasse Lehtinen, on behalf of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on the obligations of cross-border service providers ( 2006/2049(INI) ) ( A6-0294/2007 ).
